home.description: I am a systems engineer with experience in data analysis and software development to solve geospatial challenges. Skilled in data processing with Python, C++, and SQL, using tools such as pandas, numpy, scipy, or-tools, among others. Extensive experience in web development using technologies like Angular, Node.js, FastAPI, and React.
